column4: Right.  Nice one mcphail.  I'll check it out for future apps.  Hopefully I'll be alright with the standard repositories though.
Although I did get tempted into the Rhythmbox update... some kind dude on the forums linked to a pre-made deb file.  It broke Ubuntu-desktop, but I just re-installed that aftewards.
There's a clipboard app in KDE, shwag, but I don't know if Gnome has something similar, or if you can just use that one...
klipper -- I think it probably would work.
